StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetDisposi.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@StatusType char(1) = 'E', @StatusCode char(1) = 'A' AS
SELECT DISPOSITION_CODE, DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION FROM STATUS_DISPOSITION WHERE STATUS_TYPE = @StatusType AND STATUS_CODE = @StatusCode ORDER BY DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION
